t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, u, d) = map(int, input().split())
    h = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = 0
    num = h[0]
    para = 1
    for j in h:
        if j >= num and j - num <= u:
            c += 1
            num = j
        elif j <= num and num - j <= d:
            c += 1
            num = j
        elif j <= num and para == 1:
            c += 1
            para = 0
            num = j
        else:
            break
    print(c)
